snippet: A collection of 3,600 posters that were stolen by the Nazis in 1938 and were recently returned to the owner’s son by order of a German court will be put up for auction.
abstract: A collection of 3,600 posters that were stolen by the Nazis in 1938 and were recently returned to the owner’s son by order of a German court will be put up for auction.
lead_paragraph: A collection of 3,600 posters that were stolen by the Nazis in 1938 and were recently returned to the owner’s son by order of a German court will be put up for auction.

headline.main: Poster Collection Taken by Nazis to Be Sold
